qas.question: What sports activity is featured in The Times on Mondays?
What kind of football game is featured in the Scottish edition of The Times?
What is the name of the section that features football on Mondays in The Times?

context: <a2_0>The Game<a2_0/> is included in the newspaper on Mondays, and details all the weekend's <a0_0>football<a0_0/> activity (Premier League and Football League Championship, League One and League Two.) The Scottish edition of The Game also includes results and analysis from <a1_0>Scottish Premier League<a1_0/> games.
